programme.title: Chicago Fire S12
programme.desc: Julia spends a couple of days at 51. Boden’s stepson, James, returns desperate for Boden to help his mother. After a little girl starts a fire in her backyard, Kidd and her team decide to dig deeper.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Noddy is suspicious when Revs suddenly slows down during a race on the roller coaster in DareDale. He doesn't like to lose and doesn't understand what's happened. Noddy needs to investigate so that they don't lose another race! Using all his investigate skills Noddy follows the clues to the Farm where he finds out that Revs deliberately slowed down so his friend Tractor wouldn't come last as usual. Noddy realises what a great friend Revs is to Tractor. He suggests that they have another race for fun and not just to win. This time EVERYONE has fun! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN's Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live.

programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues.

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on what’s happening in every facet of business.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.desc: Best friends Tip and Oh drive each other crazy when he moves into the human world with her./Oh stirs up trouble when he tries to act like Santa Claus.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip busts Oh eating kitty litter and says he'll never get kissed by My Mom again./Oh and Tip help out all his friends when they freeze into Boovsicles.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Turbo must become a hero by saving the city from a menacing tiger beetle, who has challenged him to a race on an insane stunt-filled obstacle course.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: When White Shadow is invited to play a daring sport against his hero, an athletic dung beetle, the crew is worried he doesn't know the game is fixed. // Chet gets taken by a con artist gecko and bets Turbo's shell. When Turbo is challenged, he must go slow to try to beat the gecko at his own game.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Ty, Revvit and the crew save a band of Woodland Reptools from an evil and destructive Sawmetradon named Splitter who refuses to join the Trux team.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: When Sherman's friends crash the show for an impromptu beach party, he and his rival both do a trick jump over a whale shark to win over a girl

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Fang Decay Why is Thatch acting meaner than usual? He has a fang-ache! Scare Day Mantha is determined to become the first zombie ever to win the Super Boo?Scare School's ultimate scaring competition.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Noddy is suspicious when Revs suddenly slows down during a race on the roller coaster in DareDale. He doesn't like to lose and doesn't understand what's happened. Noddy needs to investigate so that they don't lose another race! Using all his investigate skills Noddy follows the clues to the Farm where he finds out that Revs deliberately slowed down so his friend Tractor wouldn't come last as usual. Noddy realises what a great friend Revs is to Tractor. He suggests that they have another race for fun and not just to win. This time EVERYONE has fun! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi has decided to film an average day in Flowertot garden. Yet everybody starts acting strangely as soon as the camera appears. What will the end film look like?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Crocky has got a wobbly tooth. He really wants it to fall out. He and his friends try all sorts of different ways to try and help the tooth fall out… will any of them work?

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Tag's scooter breaks down during a Race Cadet challenge to deliver boxes of Sam Whippet’s Chocolate Chippet’s the fastest. So Tag and Scooch must rely on other ways of getting around town. / Muttfield the Magnificent is set to perform a magic show at Yip’s birthday party! Until he accidentally makes himself disappear. Muttfield instructs Tag and Scooch to retrieve three magical items to make him appear again. But can they do it in time?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. / Kelp’s unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Kowloon Walled City
programme.desc: Neng was a street fighter in Northeast China but decides to start a new life in Hong Kong’s Kowloon Walled City. Unfortunately, he is implicated in the fights and conspiracies among the triad forces. When his good friend is hunted down by the triad, Neng must team up with the residents of Kowloon Walled City to fight back and save his friend.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Fist of Legend
programme.desc: When Chen Zhen studies in Japan, he finds several Chinese students missing and accidentally uncovers the Black Dragon Society’s conspiracy. A new drug is invented to boost bodies of the Japanese troops in war and the Chinese students are used in their experiments. Chen Zhen vows to take down the evil society and destroy their secret laboratory.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: VR Fighter
programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei has post‐traumatic stress disorder after his wife's death. One day, he encounters Amy who works for a VR technology firm and is invited for a new product test. After the test, Long Wei becomes the firm’s VR fighter and dons the newly invented armour. However, as mysterious armed men break in, a fierce battle has just begun...

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Grey Men 2
programme.desc: Triad boss Song seeks to whitewash his image and seize Laika’s mayoral seat amid the regime change. Despite colluding with officials, he faces a funding shortfall. To bolster his power, Song’s right-hand man and enforcer resort to violent crimes. Just as Song believes success is within reach, the dynamics among the three take an unexpected turn…

programme.title: The Trigonal: Fight for Justice
programme.desc: An international crime syndicate runs a drug-induced underground fighting tournament, where fighters become guinea pigs for experimental drugs. A retired MMA champion is forced to fight in the tournament. The syndicate thugs brutally assault his wife and kill his best friend, leaving him with no other choice but to fight for justice.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: One Night Stand Murder
programme.desc: A woman must fight to clear her name after she wakes up in an unfamiliar house with a dead man - and no memory of what happened. Based on true events.

programme.title: A Roommate To Die For
programme.desc: After a nasty breakup, Faith needs a new roommate to pay for the home. The new renter seems great until Faith finds that something very strange is going on.

programme.title: Maid For Revenge
programme.desc: A maid wakes up covered in blood beside her client's pool, with the owner dead in the water, her young son's son's life in jeopardy - and no memory of what has occurred.

programme.title: Don't Scream, It's Me
programme.desc: Fifteen years ago, Liz's ex-boyfriend, Drew, was caught robbing a bank. Now, he's in her backyard, asking her to hide him. She agrees to help, but only once her husband is out of the house.

programme.title: Triple Digit Flip (S2)
programme.desc: It's a choice between two different properties; a lakefront gem with huge potential profit but massive renovation costs, or an outdated, unrenovated ranch home occupied by the same family for 50 years.

programme.title: Triple Digit Flip (S2)
programme.desc: There's a choice between two options: one so neglected that it's been fined by the city for its filthy pool, or one straight out of the 1950's, with the original electrics intact.

programme.title: Triple Digit Flip (S2)
programme.desc: It's a choice between a hollowed out house abandoned mid-flip by another investor, or a mid-century gut job with a potential money-making opportunity for their next buyer: a rentable living space.

programme.title: Rachael Ray In Tuscany
programme.desc: Author and chef Sara Moulton joins Rachael in her Tuscan kitchen for a cooking challenge. Both Rachael and Sara create mystery meals using ingredients from Rachael's Tuscan pantry.

programme.title: Kings Of BBQ
programme.desc: Cedric and Anthony hone in on their signature tastes with the Pilot R&D team. A visit with the marketing team and Mike Meldman help the guys dive further into the purpose of launching the brand.

programme.title: House Of Deadly Lies
programme.desc: A stay-at-home mum takes in her struggling best friend to help her through a tough time - but soon, secrets are revealed that could tear her family apart and put everyone in danger.

programme.title: Maid For Revenge
programme.desc: A maid wakes up covered in blood beside her client's pool, with the owner dead in the water, her young son's son's life in jeopardy - and no memory of what has occurred.

programme.title: How She Caught A Killer
programme.desc: The Route 40 Killer targets sex workers with an unknown motive. Detective Linda Murphy goes undercover and gets entangled in a chilling cat-and-mouse game, reminiscent of The Silence of the Lambs.

programme.title: Pet Telling
programme.desc: Well-heeled pet owners give their dogs a glamorous life of high-end outfits, opulent dining and visits to trendy bars and dog spas - but still worry if their pets are enjoying their enviable lives.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: Josh Niland, the fish king, surprises all the contestants when he unveils perfectly butchered cuts of beef. He then leads the kitchen in a masterclass on how to butcher a tuna to represent beef cuts.

programme.desc: It’s the classic MasterChef team-relay challenge, where four teams must compete to create a dish that uses potatoes in at least two ways. The winning team will secure immunity from the next elimination.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)

programme.desc: Ellen and Louie are estranged lovers whose son is accidentally shot by Tato, a son of a prominent politician. However, in their constant vigil besides their comatose son, their feelings towards each other are rekindled.

programme.title: Onyok Velasco Story
programme.desc: Born to a family of boxers, Onyok Velasco ate and breathed boxing. The whole nation watched his fight, hoping and praying for Onyok to win the gold. Robbed of the gold or not, Onyok, without doubt, came home victorious.

programme.title: Rosalie 19: Reyna Ng Bocaue
programme.desc: For many years, Monette has raised her daughter on her earnings as a bold dancer. But now that she is old, she finds herself ousted as the club's main attraction. Instead, she finds out her daughter Rosalie (Ilonah Jean) is taking her place as queen of the girls joints. But, one by one, Rosalie's enemies are found dead including the corrupt club owner and Monette's lustful boyfriend.

programme.title: Campus Beat
programme.desc: The 15-year old Aga personifies the young man of the times. He is living a normal teen-age life, doing a balancing act between his separated parents, his family and his friends, his studies and his love for music and the beginnings of young love.

programme.title: Bagwis Ng Lawin
programme.desc: Bagwis Ng Lawin

programme.title: Minsan Pa (Kahit Konting Pagtingin 2) (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The sequel to the first blockbuster team-up of FPJ and Sharon Cuneta in "Kahit Konting Pagtingin". This time around, their roles were reversed. Now that they had been given a second chance, they became determined to find out.

programme.title: Alabang Girls (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Alabang, an upscale suburb on the South of Manila, was the setting for this wacky tale of boys from the wrong side of the tracks, who easily fall for rich and pretty girls, who lived in Alabang.

programme.title: Doctor, Doctor We Are Sick
programme.desc: The foursome, Vilma and TVJ played bumbling orderlies,whose work method was enough to send patients out of the hospital or to undeserved calamity, although they were, in truth, caring and kind-hearted and were only trying to do good.

programme.title: Noel Juico, 16 Batang Kriminal
programme.desc: Noel (Raymart Santiago) tries to stay out of trouble. But trouble seems to follow him anyway. Can Noel disentangle himself from the dangerous web he himself created?

programme.title: Eagle Squad (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eight young men of different convictions, lifestyles and outlook in life banded together to become the Eagle Squad, an elite group of secret marshalls formed to counteract criminal elements in the city.

programme.title: Tgis, The Movie
programme.desc: The top-rating TV show about teen-age life came to the screen in this adventure film where the TGIS kids learned the value of friendship.

programme.title: Walang Matigas Na Pulis Sa Matinik Na Misis
programme.desc: Admired for his good looks and his popularity with the ladies, most people would call Bart (Bong Revilla Jr). But if there's one thing that grounds Bart, that's his fear of his wife.

programme.title: Irosin, Pagputok Ng Araw... Babaha ng Dugo
programme.desc: Anthony Alonzo portrays P/Capt. Antonio Dy, Station Commander of Irosin, Sorsogon. Dy is a recipient of the Medal of Valor from Pres. Cory Aquino for defending the municipal hall from armed NPA rebels.

programme.title: SAMURAI CASTLES: Aizuwakamatsu
programme.desc: This castle, 200km north of Tokyo, was a battleground in Japan's last civil war in the mid-19th C. Modern warfare did not bring it down. We look at the secrets to the its strengths and its lords.

programme.desc: Kanazawa City, Ishikawa Prefecture, is a known castle town. In one commercial area sits a piano, which passersby love to visit and play from the heart.

programme.title: Documentary 360

programme.title: Ranch To Table (S4)
programme.desc: After a historic amount of rain, Elizabeth Poett and a crew of friends and family have tons of projects they need to do to get the ranch back in shape.

programme.title: Ranch To Table (S4)
programme.desc: As a seventh generation cattle rancher, Elizabeth comes from a close-knit family. Whenever they can, Elizabeth and her mom get together to enjoy a casual lunch.

programme.title: The Fruit Nerd: Field To Feast (S1)
programme.desc: Paying a visit to an African-Australian owned and operated farm, Thanh unearths some of the secrets behind this emerging vegetable that is very popular internationally.

programme.title: The Fruit Nerd: Field To Feast (S1)
programme.desc: Drying persimmons is a Korean culinary method that takes months. Thanh follows the epic journey the persimmon takes from farm, into a Korean kitchen and on to his plate.

programme.title: Makan Kakis - Heritage Edition (S1)
programme.desc: Denise introduces Chef Melvyn Lee to Shashlik Restaurant, where they dine on scrumptious Russian inspired dishes that have been given a local Hainanese twist.

programme.title: Makan Kakis - Heritage Edition (S1)
programme.desc: Chef Melvyn Lee takes Denise on journey through Chinatown where they learn how to make Tong Heng's signature diamond-shaped egg tarts.

programme.title: Fast Foods Gone Global (S1)
programme.desc: U.S. Fast Food culture is inspired by African and Mid East street foods.

programme.title: Paradise Kitchen Bali (S1)
programme.desc: Paradise Kitchen with Lauren Camilleri takes viewers on a tantalizing culinary journey through Bali.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 12
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q freak out a focus group by reading ridiculous answers, and then participate in a thrilling toilet paper shootout in their favorite market. Plus, the loser's fancy dinner party turns into the messiest ride of his life.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 13
programme.desc: The guys hit the seas for a special cruise episode! They turn the pool deck into a playground, give misinformation while posing as entertainment directors, and two Jokers get a double dose of torture in a two part punishment!

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 1
programme.desc: The guys get sassy while posing as auto parts salesmen, then head to the mall where they try to reel in unsuspecting shoppers. And tonight's big loser is stuck in a horrible mess after being locked inside a rigged bathroom of horrors.

programme.title: Friends S5 9
programme.desc: Ross becomes upset when someone at work takes his sandwich from the refrigerator and eats it. Joey finds himself in a terrible mess when he tries to cover for Chandler and Monica's dating.

programme.title: Friends S5 10
programme.desc: Phoebe collects money for the Salvation Army during the holidays. A bored Ross creates havoc in Joey and Chandler's lives. Rachel is disturbed by her date's inappropriate relationship with his sister.

programme.title: Friends S5 11
programme.desc: The friends all make New Year's resolutions, but it looks like Rachel's resolution – to stop gossiping – is going to be the hardest to keep when she finds out about Chandler and Monica's dating.

programme.title: Friends S5 12
programme.desc: Chandler's behavior toward his boss annoys Monica. Ross' latest romance astounds everyone.

programme.title: Friends S5 13
programme.desc: Phoebe meets her father at her grandmother's funeral. Chandler discovers that Monica gives bad massages. Rachel dresses Joey for an audition. complete with a man's shoulder bag.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 4
programme.desc: Michael stumps a delivery man by pulling live crabs out of a Chinese food order and leaves a mother and daughter in disbelief by using a spinning bowl to extract peanuts from candy. Plus, he puts one man in a serious ethical dilemma.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 5
programme.desc: This week, Michael stuns shoppers at a thrift mart with a remarkably advanced antique that self-tailors clothes and a chalkboard that solves mathematical equations. And at a hardware store, a DIYer is left questioning the intelligence of beetles that follow blueprints and unscrew nuts and bolts. Plus, one woman is shocked and bewildered when Michael disappears and reappears before her very eyes.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 6
programme.desc: Michael fishes for trouble in a toy store with pop-up books that contain live animals and, at a health food store, he makes a woman's day by showing her how to milk almonds. Later, a mummy causes an employee to question ancient curses.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 7
programme.desc: Michael gets spooky at an antique store with a vintage voodoo doll and, at a costume store, a Dorothy outfit comes complete with a little dog too. Then, at an arcade, the atmosphere turns from fun to freaky for an employee when Michael gets "zapped" from one game to the next.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 8
programme.desc: Filling in as a karate instructor, Michael disrupts the Zen of his student with skills that literally lift him off the ground, and at a toy store, Michael's frog necklace is so fashionably realistic that it has one little girl begging for a new pet. Then at a military outfitting store, Michael and an employee put together a clothing display that puts the "man" in mannequin.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 9
programme.desc: Michael works at a camping store where his life-saving s'mores and pop-up coolers stun would-be glampers, and later at a health food store, a child safety pill bottle with built-in invisibility proves too complicated for adults. Then, at variety store, a customer goes off the rails when Michael adjusts the size of a model train.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 10
programme.desc: The guys crash a gallery opening where their antics aren't appreciated, they pass bizarre judgment on unsuspecting grocery shoppers, and the loser takes a spin on a terrifying wheel, where one wrong move could have deadly consequences.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 11
programme.desc: The guys freeze out skaters at an ice rink's rental counter, and head to the mall where they have the audacity to ask strangers to mind their manners. Then, tonight's loser is down for the count after donning a diaper for a sumo-sized punishment.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 12
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q freak out a focus group by reading ridiculous answers, and then participate in a thrilling toilet paper shootout in their favorite market. Plus, the loser's fancy dinner party turns into the messiest ride of his life.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 13
programme.desc: The guys hit the seas for a special cruise episode! They turn the pool deck into a playground, give misinformation while posing as entertainment directors, and two Jokers get a double dose of torture in a two part punishment!

Then, at variety store, a customer goes off the rails when Michael adjusts the size of a model train.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 10
programme.desc: Michael befuddles a hardware store patron with a collapsible spray paint can, and cuts a costume shop employee down to size when he shrinks into a leprechaun outfit. Later, a museum employee makes the discovery of a lifetime when a preserved egg hatches a baby dinosaur.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 11
programme.desc: Tonight, Michael tries to pull a fast one on burger joint patrons with his inflatable hot dogs and his unusual technique for bagging buns. Then he creeps out a flea market vendor when he brings an acrylic encased arachnid back to life, and later his co-worker doesn't give a hoot about her job at the camping store when an owl takes over their display.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 12
programme.desc: Michael hits the jackpot at a convenience store and amazes a mother when he demonstrates her child's genius abilities at a toy store. Later, MIchael astonishes his Japanese restaurant co-worker with a set-up that really takes the cake.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 13
programme.desc: Michael leaves a co-worker out to dry at the garden center with a technologically confounding hose that wirelessly transmits water. Later, at the dog groomers, Michael's puppy takes to the catwalk after dressing himself in the most fashionable canine attire.

programme.title: Smallville S1 10
programme.desc: A teenage girl, Amy Palmer, lets her obsession with Lex become life threatening as attacks in the Luthor mansion pit Clark against an invisible enemy.

programme.title: Magnum Force
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood stars as San Francisco Police Inspector Harry Callahan better known as "Dirty Harry" because of the tough way he pursues criminals in this bare-knuckled action film. Investigating the assassinations of crime bosses, Dirty Harry discovers the killers are police who, frustrated by the judicial system, have vowed to rid the city of crime by any means--even killing fellow police officers.

programme.title: Justice League (2017)
programme.desc: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to find and recruit a team of metahumans to stand against this newly awakened threat. But despite the formation of this unprecedented league of heroes – Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash – it may already be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

programme.title: Collateral Damage
programme.desc: Firefighter Gordon Brewer, is done putting out fires and ready to start one of his own. When his wife and child are horrifically killed in an international terrorist bombing -- linked to Claudio "The Wolf" Perrini -- the CIA and FBI offer no answers and no response. With the official investigation going nowhere, and haunted by the thought of his family's killer walking away scot-free, Gordon swears revenge, even if it takes him to Colombia.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN's Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live.

programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: The Observers
programme.desc: The Observers on France 24 is a weekly show produced with photos, videos and personal accounts from Observers around the world. They send their photos and videos, which are verified and contextualized by France 24 team of professional journalists in Paris. The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.desc: Tech billionaire, investor and philanthropist Scott Farquhar, Co-Founder and Former Co-CEO of Atlassian and Chair of Pledge 1% and the Tech Council of Australia, addresses the National Press Club.

programme.desc: Dan heads to a popular local venue on Hong Kong island for their flavourful congee. He then meets up with exciting young chef, Archan Chan, at her modern Cantonese restaurant, Ho Lee Fook.

programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.desc: The story concerns a squad of U.S. Army soldiers on a perilous assignment behind enemy lines. The mission: to risk their lives to save the life of one man, paratrooper James Ryan. Ryan is the last survivor of a family of four brothers, the rest of whom have been killed in action.

programme.desc: The epic adventures of a man who discovers that he possesses the exhilarating ability to instantly teleport anywhere in the world he can imagine.

programme.title: Heat
programme.desc: A hardened expert thief plans one last heist, but the cop on the case is obsessed with bringing him down.

programme.title: How To Train Your Dragon 2
programme.desc: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

programme.desc: An American missionary and his wife travel to the exotic island kingdom of Hawaii, intent on converting the natives. But the clash between the two cultures is too great and instead of understanding there comes tragedy.

programme.title: Open Water 2: Adrift
programme.desc: A group of old friends meet up for a reunion onboard a luxury yacht, but the event turns into a nightmare when they jump into the ocean for a swim without putting the ladder down. Stuck drifting in the ocean, they face the toughest fight of their lives.

programme.title: CNA Correspondent
programme.desc: They're your eyes and ears around the globe. CNA's network of correspondents shines a light on stories from their corners of the world, from groundbreaking events to up-and-coming trends..

programme.desc: Jakarta office workers share where to sample cuisines from across Indonesia in one food court, a delivery rider visits a warteg for comfort food on a budget, and we go on a viral dessert tour with Gen Z.

programme.title: Lights. Camera. Action On Caldecott

programme.title: Asia Tonight
programme.desc: CNA correspondents bring you the top stories of the day with 'live' reports and interviews to keep you up-to-date on the day’s events.

programme.title: Behave
programme.desc: Following the death of their friend, a group of young adults travels to a villa on the outskirts of London that contains a deep mystery. As unsettling events escalate during their luxurious stay, they must unravel the villa’s dark secrets.

programme.title: Bunshinsaba: Hoichi the Earless
programme.desc: You Mei brings home an abandoned doll found on the street. Little does she know that it is possessed by an evil spirit which causes the sudden death of her colleague. You Mei seeks help from a ghost hunter who unleashes the pencil spirit to fight against the evil spirit, unfortunately leading to a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin named Luciana is hired by a kingpin to murder a man with a valuable diamond. Complications ensue when Luciana stumbles upon a teenage girl who is held captive by the man, and the kingpin discovers that the diamond Luciana turned over is fake.

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: A struggling writer must write a hit novel to save his career. He retreats to his childhood home where his father, also a successful writer, died mysteriously. Upon discovering his father's final manuscript, he realizes it's far superior to anything he could create. He decides to plagiarize the work, setting off a series of horrifying events.

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: As the police investigate a gang murder case, another mysterious paper man murder happens, and the suspects get killed one by one. Continuing to track the clues of the case, the police finally unveil a hidden secret and tragedy over two generations.

programme.title: Jealousy
programme.desc: Model Min is admitted to a hospital, but mysteriously falls to her death at night. Rumour has it that the hospital is haunted. Subsequently, Min's photographer begins receiving eerie phone calls, the writer loses consciousness in a bizarre car accident, and her friend mysteriously disappears...

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: The Fox Demon Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a story in the novel “Strange Tales from Liaozhai”, a young student in the late Ming Dynasty meets a charming fox demon and they soon fall in love. Though they encounter several obstacles due to their different nature, the lovers continue to fight against fate. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: A young man accused of killing a beloved 52-year-old woman changes his tune after a cigarette break and DNA technology helps detectives solve a decades-old murder mystery.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S4)
programme.desc: A man falls asleep while driving and kills a construction worker on the road. Was he a reckless driver or an innocent man with an undiagnosed medical condition?

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: After a storm hits Warwick Cove, RI, a boat dragging its anchor appears in the harbour with a decomposed corpse onboard. Pathologist Dr. Priya Banerjee must identify the John Doe and determine how he died.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: A man shoots four people in broad daylight, leaving Tulsa detectives, attorneys, and everyone impacted struggling to explain his mental state.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: 9-year-old Kamryn Johnson is supposed to be at gymnastics class when her mother, Sheraton, receives a frantic phone call saying Kamryn is being held captive for ransom.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Reselling scrap junk became very hard as the market for scrap metal pays much less and so Andy had talked his mother into getting a reverse mortgage on the property.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: An elderly woman gets arrested for domestic battery after fighting with her sister. Meanwhile in Virginia Beach, a 19-year-old boy gets extradited from Miami after missing his court date.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country: a Florida tourist decides to take a scenic car drive through the ocean; a fugitive fleeing from police hides in plain sight; and more!

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S1)
programme.desc: A suspect flees from a high-speed car chase while carrying her infant child. State troopers catch a man with a stolen utility pole strapped to the roof of his car.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A shooting suspect begins cutting himself with a pocket knife after investigators leave him alone in the interrogation room; a woman breaks down after telling police that she drowned her grandmother.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A man breaks down sobbing after admitting to stabbing his mom; an actress tells detectives how and why she shot her estranged uncle; a suspected murderer tries to broker an immunity deal; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Savannah and Trent Paschal seem like the perfect suburban couple — madly in love. But when Savannah finds her calling as a funeral director, their romance ends in suspicion, and a countrywide police hunt.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Nacole Smith is brutally murdered in 1995 on a wooded path in Atlanta, the police and community rally around her mother as she seeks justice.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Heartbreaking accounts of families torn apart by crime. Ashley Wallace, who was almost killed by her own mother, Jenny Carrieri, whose search for her sister's murderer consumed her life.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S2)
programme.desc: Joshua Aide, a former Marine, is on trial for the murder of his ex-girlfriend's father, as well as her attempted murder and that of a family friend. He claims he was ambushed by the three.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: A love triangle at the University of Florida results in the murder of a popular student. An undeniable digital trail leads straight to his murderer.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: November 23, 2014, Springfield, Oregon. A housekeeper at the Village Inn Motel calls police when she finds a guest unresponsive and cold to the touch.

programme.title: Murder In The 21st
programme.desc: The peaceful town of Mountain City, TN, is rocked when a beloved young couple is found brutally murdered in their home.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: In Modesto, a woman is brought in for her 14th felony charge, while a young man is arrested after not having reflectors on his bicycle. A man dances his way to the drunk tank.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: A man is gunned down outside a local shop and authorities interrogate two of his acquaintances to find out which one of them pulled the trigger.

programme.title: Sch - Le Concert De L'Orange Velodrome
programme.desc: As part of his Decennium tour, rapper SCH is celebrating 10 years in the music business with a special concert at Marseille's Orange Velodrome. A grandiose show, in front of more than 53,000 spectators, with a host of guests: JuL, Kofs, Naps, Soso Maness, Elams, Solda, Houari, Sofiane Pamart, Squeezie...

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: L'Or Bleu Des Alpes, Un Bien Menace
programme.desc: Amidst Europe's highest mountains, scientists, divers and mountaineers begin a totally unique exploration in the icy waters of the Alps. From the summit of Mont Blanc to the depths of the high altitude lakes, they set out to demonstrate the vulnerability of our most precious resource: freshwater.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Qu'est-Ce Qu'elle A Ma Famille ?
programme.desc: Celine and Mathieu, a farming couple, applied to adopt five years ago. A social worker visits them, but is only able to offer a child with multiple disabilities. The social worker's trainee quietly slips them the contact details of a friend who, with his partner, had used a surrogate mother...

programme.title: La Peinture FranCaise Autour Du Monde
programme.desc: A fine arts museum located in Pasadena, to the north-east of Los Angeles, the Norton Simon Museum displays a superb collection of European paintings, from Renaissance to Modern art. Classical French art is represented by Lorrain, Poussin, Fragonard, Robert, Boucher, Vernet, Vigee Le Brun...

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Pompon Ours
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: Conte-Nous !
programme.desc: A long, long time ago, in the heart of the African savannah, animals still had the gift of speech. It was also a time of story-telling, of tales that had so much to teach us, where the main character was a lion, a hyena, a leopard or a frog.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Api !
programme.desc: It's the teacher's birthday! The whole class celebrates with him in a light and joyful atmosphere. But Api is not in the mood for the party: her friends no longer speak to her.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Felix persuades Lounis to start dating. Flavie is invited to her aunt's in San Francisco but Ian isn't sure about letting her go on her own.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: In the early morning, Gaspard Watson suddenly arrives at Clarissa's, completely disoriented and covered in blood that is visibly not his own. His last memory is of having left the police station the day before, and thereafter nothing: a total blackout.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: As Jackson manages to piece together Gaspard's actions during the course of the previous evening, he discovers that he'd been in the company of a woman who has since disappeared. Did Gaspard commit a crime, or is someone trying to frame him?

programme.title: Carbone
